channel.title: CVE Feed for codesupplyco -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for codesupplyco -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4421|2024-10-21T18:11:58.352Z -- codesupplyco -- advanced%20popups
item.description: The Advanced Popups plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.1.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the metabox_popup_save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save meta tags via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-9025|2024-09-26T08:29:46.489Z -- codesupplyco -- sight%20%E2%80%93%20professional%20image%20gallery%20and%20portfolio
item.description: The Sight – Professional Image Gallery and Portfolio plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'handler_post_title' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to expose private, pending, trashed, and draft post titles. Successful exploitation requires the Elementor plugin to be installed and activated.

item.title: CVE-2024-9025|2024-09-26T13:36:19.248Z -- codesupplyco -- sight%20%E2%80%93%20professional%20image%20gallery%20and%20portfolio
item.description: The Sight – Professional Image Gallery and Portfolio plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'handler_post_title' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to expose private, pending, trashed, and draft post titles. Successful exploitation requires the Elementor plugin to be installed and activated.
